transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, Sahil sir?
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Sahil sir, main Pragya Gulati baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART se, Assistant Vice President.
Executive: Sir, meri team se aapka discussion ho raha hai, aapka kuch concern open hai related to a ticket, related to aapka kuch issue hai, to main usi bare mein baat karna chah rahi thi. Sir, kya issue aa raha hai services se jo hum resolve kar sake, bataiye?
Customer: Madam, issue ye hai ki mera jo business hai na.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Is time good nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Itna achchi nahi hai business.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur main sab jagah se jitna bhi mera money laga hua hai har jagah main apni wapsi le raha hun kyunki mere ko thoda sa logon ne pareshan kar rakha hai payment ke liye.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Isliye maine karobar chalta tha unhone mere ko sab taraf se pareshan ho rakha hun.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Meri health bhi achchi nahi hai ki main jaake unke paas se payment le lu.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Isliye maine IndiaMART se maine bola jitne din ki aapki service lagi hai do teen mahine ki aap payment kaat ke baki mere ko wapis kar do. Aur yahi issue tha aur kuch nahi.
Executive: Sir, sir aapne jab humse liya tha to hamara jaise package hota hai humne to aapko pure ek saal ki service deni hi hai. Matlab usme kuch waisa nahi hai ki aap kuch nahi kar raha hun aap dekh lijiye.
Executive: Sir, par wo to thik hai lekin hamare yahan kuch aisa option nahi hota hai ki aap achanak hi aapka mind change ho. Humne to apna piche se pura software, pura system aapke liye ek saal ke liye wahan bound kar rakha hai. Us hisab se license hamara chalta hai. Hum is tarah se thodi na karenge kuch bhi.
Customer: Mere ko to aapke yahan se aap mere na apna record check kar lo aapne mere ko kitna business diya hai aur maine aapko kitne paise diye hain aap mere ko.
Executive: Sir, wo to ek alag baat ho jati hai na ekdam.
Customer: Kya alag baat ho jati hai madam teen char din mere sath aisa hi ho chuka hai aapke yahan se.
Executive: Sir, aap mujhe ye bataiye na ki aap jo wo baat kar rahe hain ki business business.
Customer: Madam aap logon ne na pehle to mere se thaggi mari hai do teen bar do bar pehle bhi payment le chuke ho. Ye achchi baat nahi hai. Mere ko koi baat nahi nahi deni payment mat do main aur kya legal process se jaunga main likh ke de jaunga sabko ki haan bhai in logon ne mere sath aisa aisa kiya hai. Baat khatam ho gayi. Aapne nahi deni payment mat do.
Executive: Sir, aap business ka actually baat kar rahe the to main usi ka reply kar rahi hun ki business nahi diya.
Customer: Madam aap aapne na jo meri baat suno jo aapke ek minute meri baat suno.
Customer: Jo aapke pehle banda baat kar raha tha wo bhi yahi baat kar raha tha jo uske pehle banda baat kar raha tha wo bhi yahi baat kar raha tha. Thik hai aapke hath mein nahi hai to chhod dijiye rehne dijiye koi baat nahi.
Executive: Sir, hamare yahan refund hota hi nahi hai. Dekhiye aaj bhi main dekh rahi hun buyer aa raha hai.
Customer: Har jagah refund hota hai. Sarkari kanunan yahi kanun yahi kehta hai ki jo cheez aapko aapke liye nahi bani wo aap refund kar sakte ho.
Executive: Sir, to aap pehle sara hum log evaluate karate hain na aap dekhiye hazar piece ki aaj bhi.
Customer: Aapne government se evaluate kara rakha hai ki humne paise nahi dene logon ke wapis jo wapis mangenge to.
Executive: Sir, ek minute hoti hai sir main hum to aapko business.
Customer: Ye legal procedure hai pehle ye batao. Ye Hindustan ka procedure kanun ye kehta hai ki agar aapne policy ki hai aapko nahi pasand aa rahi to aap apni payment wapis le sakte ho aapka paisa haram ka nahi hai.
Executive: Sir, sir aap dekhiye na aapki business.
Customer: Aapne jitne ki service li hai wo aap service kaat ke mere ko baki paisa do. Main bhi apna paisa mang raha hun aapko thodi mang raha hun na.
Executive: Sir, aapne business ka point sir aapne business ka point bola na ek contract hai aapne business ka point bola.
Customer: Contract mein bhi aise hi hota hai har jagah hi aisa hota hai.
Executive: Sir, hazar piece ka aaj bhi Ludhiana se.
Customer: Madam koi aisa hai agar aapko service hi nahi mere ko pasand meri baat suno aapka contract hi nahi achcha lag raha hai mere ko. Mere ko koi iske andar mera health issue hi nahi sahi aa raha hai to main aapka contract leke kya karunga.
Executive: Sir, to aapko hum help karenge na use karne mein aap dekhiye aaj bhi main aapko aapke account managers hun.
Customer: Kya help karenge madam mere meri baat suno mere pass chhe cycle pade hain andar.
Executive: Aapko account account manager jo hai wo aapko roz lead bhejega dekhiye hazar piece ki buylead aaj bhi aa rakhi hai teen ghante pehle Ludhiana ki hi buylead hai 5 se 10 lakh ka isme order value hai aur jo buyer hai wo business use ki requirement de raha hai. Bicycle BB shell. Buyer hamare sath 12 mahine se.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: Ji madam boliye.
Executive: Sir, main to Sahil sir se baat kar rahi thi actually to unse meri baat continuity chal rahi thi. To main unhe yahi bata rahi thi unhone mujhe shuru mein hi bola ki agar hamare aap hame aapke yahan se business nahi mil raha hai aap hame nahi de rahe hain to hum kya karenge to maine usi ka unko seedha bataya ki business to hum aaj bhi de rahe hain. Hazar piece ki Ludhiana Punjab se teen ghante pehle ki business use ke liye buylead aa rakhi hai. Buyer hamare sath.
Customer: Madam ye sari buylead aapki bekar hai. A to Z bekar hai.
Executive: Sir, wo to dekhiye dekh kar aap bol sakte hain but yahin se sare supplier business uthate hain sir. Agar hum late buylead.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Are late ki baat hi nahi hai madam. Jab buylead aayi maine call ki agar keh rahe main to khud supplier hun. Main to khud mang le.
Executive: Ek do case mein sir aapne bhi showroom khola hoga.
Customer: Supplier khud galiyan nikalta hai IndiaMART bekar hai pata nahi aapne kyun plan le liya.
Executive: Sir, aap bol rahe hain ki.
Customer: Ye jagah to humen samajh aa gayi ki cheat gaya jaldi hai.
Executive: Sir, aap ek baat bataiye na ki bhaiya aap kuch buyers aisa bol sakte hain main ye bilkul mana nahi karungi aap bol rahe hain wo baat sahi ho sakti hai aapki. Sare buyers aise hote to itna bada platform har mahine grow nahi karta na sir. Aisa nahi ho sakta na.
Customer: Aise hi buylead jab aap ek minute karke aage sale karoge to kyun nahi bolege. Koi sale karoge jab hum aapko buylead.
Executive: Sir, buylead mil rahi hai na roz aapko aap consume karenge tabhi to business milega.
Customer: Consume karni nahi hai mera mera 1% bhi man nahi hai aapka IndiaMART use karne ka isliye maine aapko first time bhi bola tha ki plan lene se pehle Shruti se baat hui thi to unko maine bola tha mujhe abhi tak kam nahi mil raha. Aage bhi aapse kam milne ki koi ummid nahi hai unhone kya bola aapka hai normal plan. Ye to har koi jaise free use kar raha hai usi ke tarah ka hi hai. Main kaha aapne jab ye jab diya tha tab bhi yahi baat ki thi ki aap normal use kar rahe ho free use kar rahe ho to aapke pass ye nahi options hai ye nahi options hai to aap ye lo aapko kam badhiya badhiya business milega. Sir, business to aaj.
Customer: Uske baad jab media aap bol rahe ho ki aap upgrade karao tab aapko achcha business milega upgrade kara liya tab bhi aapki sunwai kuch nahi hai maine usse bhi bola tha ki mujhe nahi business mila to maine aapko na refund lena hai abhi refund lene ke chakkar mein aap itni sari be faltu ki baton ke seekhte ho na ki banda kehta hai refund karke khali karo dusre client pe dhyan do aap to paise dene hi nahi chahte ho bas lena jante ho.
Executive: Sir, dene ki baat hi nahi hai agar business na ho tab denge na aapko koi koi bhi aapne ek saal ka service.
Customer: Are maine yahi to business kiya isi chakkar mein to mera business loss mein ja raha hai. Main apna 50000 aapke pass fasa ke baith gaya hun.
Executive: Sir, bicycle BB shell 10000 hazar piece ki requirement aaj bhi aa rakhi hai.
Customer: Hogi to main kya karu mere pass hota hi nahi wo main kyun usko accept karu main bewkuf hun. Mere pass bicycle ki options hai. Steel part ki thodi na jo aap mang rahe ho bicycle ko manufacture karne ke liye frame ko.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Aise kuch bhi lead thodi na utha denge.
Executive: Bicycle ki hi lead hai sir sirf usi ki nahi hai main dekh rahi hun aapke bicycle.
Customer: Sir aap hi ne dala hua hai buylead consume kiya aap hi to de sakte ho na server pe kya show kar raha hai.
Executive: Sir, wo to.
Customer: Ye to hai nahi ki maine kabhi use hi nahi ki buylead aapki. Free mein milta wahan se kuch hai hi nahi hai.
Executive: Sir, aap consume karenge tab to milega na aapne to consumption chhod rakha hai.
Customer: Sir dekho do baten hain. Maine mail dali hui hai mujhe mera refund chahiye agar aapne be faltu ki time kharab karna hai mere sath ye sab baten karke to thik hai main call cut kar raha hun. Nahi to main aage complaint karunga aapki.
Executive: Sir, mujhe samajh nahi aa raha kis hisab se aapko refund chahiye kya dikkat aa rahi hai service.
Customer: Mujhe madam refund chahiye iske baad mujhe aur kuch nahi sunna maine sari scenario samjhaya pada hai ki mujhe apna sirf paisa chahiye maine kam nahi karna IndiaMART se.
Executive: Sir, jab ek saal ki service lete hain to usko use karte hain tabhi to business milta hai na aap.
Customer: Are maine itni der wait ki hai aapne showroom ka plan bhi use kiya hai na aap dekh sakte ho na wahan pe aap lakh ka showroom bhi khol kar agar baithte hain to aap ek mahine baad do mahine baad usko bhi band kar dete hain.
Executive: Are main mujhe na aap jo chhod rahe ho na ye mat chhodo.
Customer: Sir, simple si to baat hai.
Customer: Mujhe 1% koi fark nahi padta aap jo bol rahe ho aapka kam hi yahi sada hai. Aapne to sirf bakwas karni hai is kam ke time se aap phone kiya jata hai na tab aapka koi banda nahi aata aapne kya bola tha aapke pass har mahine visit karega banda aapka specially aake dekhega yahan pe aake listing karega photos khechega kahan hai wo banda ek bari visit kiya koi aapko certificate aane wala tha certificate aaya aapka deliver hua. Ye sab aapke plan bechne ki tarike se hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir certificate agar aapke pass nahi aayi aap mujhe abhi bata rahe hain. Certificate.
Customer: Mujhe aapke baad hi nahi karni maine aapko bol diya maine mail dali hui hai wahan pe aap revert karo mujhe faltu mein be faltu mein ye pareshan mat karo roz call karke hame batao kyun aapne band karna hai. Aap kyun nahi continue kar rahe ho kyun nahi use kar rahe ho yahan pe ye hai wahan pe wo hai isliye ye sab sunna main.
Executive: Sir, humen ye pata hai ki aap hamare supplier hain aap hamare sath listed hain aur hum aapko madad kar sakte hain aap business growth ke liye aaye hain opportunity.
Customer: Aapki madad honi hoti na bahut time pehle ho jani thi. Jab aapko bol do na kam nahi aa raha humne band karna bolte ji ye plan le lo ji isme to feature hai aapko kam badhiya aa jayega.
Executive: Main koi plan bol rahi hun sir plan kahan bola maine aapne abhi to teen mahine pehle to apna achcha sa ek plan liya hai iski to use karne isko bhi to isme aapko 34 buylead har mahine milti hain 34 kahan aap use kar rahe hain abhi aapne recent mein kids bicycle quantity 12 ki consume ki thi buylead Ludhiana ki hi takriban 26000 ke ye order value ki thi Sachin sir the isme.
Customer: Usko usne order lagaya mujhe.
Executive: To sir aapne kab hi baat ki thi unse kab hi baat ki thi kab baat ki thi?
Customer: Mujhe to pata nahi maine kab baat ki hai kaun se aap bata rahe hain 12.
Executive: 11 October ko 12 buylead kya bol rahe hain aap. Quantity 12 thi main 12 buylead nahi quantity isme 12 kids bicycle ki thi 11 October ko aapne ye consume ki thi buylead Sachin naam se.
Customer: 11 October ko main maine ki hi nahi hai. Main isko use hi nahi kar raha hun wo time pehle.
Executive: 11 October ko ek mahina pehle ek mahina pehle to aap active the. Tabhi ka main bata rahi hun.
Customer: Main main kya keh raha hun main use hi nahi karna chahta hun itni bekar service hai main apna jeevan ka kimti samay isme use hi nahi karna chahta hun utilize hi nahi karna maine yahan pe. Main to paisa deke baith gaya hun. Yahi paisa maine kahin aur invest kiya hota achchi return to aati na. Aapse main ummid kar raha tha ki aap kam achcha nikaloge lekin hai sirf to ki baten.
Executive: Sir dekhiye refund policy to hamare pass nahi hai aapko service agar nahi chahiye.
Customer: Thik hai koi issue nahi hai aapne bol diya main abhi isko download kara sakta hun IndiaMART pe okay.
Executive: Thik hai sir main service download kara sakti hun kyunki business hum aapko de pa rahe hain lekin refund ki policy hamare pass nahi hai.
Customer: Business aap kahan de rahe hain business ka kya matlab hota hai. Ye to business thodi hua. Jo aap mujhe de rahe ho 50 wahi 50 aage supplier baithe hain sabko to free fund mein bant rahe ho.
Executive: Nahi dete hain sir nahi dete hain jaise hi jaise hi ekdam panch supplier consume kar lete hain ek buylead wo buylead hi sold out ho jati hai. To chahe hum 50 ko dikha de sir policy hai tabhi to sold out aati hai buylead kyun aati hai sold out isliye aati hai.
Customer: Mujhe to aaj tak nahi dikhi. Kyunki aapki industry mein itna aap agar marble industry ki baat karenge na hamare pass marble ke suppliers hain unki wahan buylead ek ek minute mein sold out ho jati hai kyunki wo bahut high moving products hai. Wahan ki buylead tikti nahi hai. Aur kuch industries hum dekhte hain machinery wagera.
Executive: Sir main naam bata chuki hun Sahil sir ko koi baat nahi ab aap kis liye naam le rahe hain mujhe nahi pata. Lekin main aapko bata rahi hun sir apne apne experience se aapko bata rahi hun.
Customer: Chalo koi baat nahi main recording line mein sun lunga koi dikkat nahi chhodo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for unused subscription.

- Claims business is not good, facing financial issues.

- Alleges IndiaMART cheated him multiple times.

- States health issues prevent him from pursuing payments.



Resolution:

- Executive explains refund not possible as per policy.

- Mentions one-year service agreement.

- Highlights recent buyleads and account manager support.

- Offers to help customer utilize the platform better.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer will file a complaint.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, buyleads, business, policy
